Tooltip_lang: Enables you to stable five more mounts at the stable for public display.
A rare mount trader has taken up shop at your garrison stables building.
Allows you to abort a current mission and immediately bring followers back.
Recruit a random follower with a specific Trait, Ability or Role for 10 Material.
Enables access to garrison cooking dailies.
Additional miners will fill carts for you that are full of ore and other strange things.
Plant an orchard in your garrison that will produce rare fruit.
Increases the hourly skin gathering rate by 10%.
Creates bonus material by crushing the waste rocks from mining for use in roads, concrete, etc.
Removes travel time for the first misison every day that requres 5 followers.
Provides access to portals that grant transport to cities other than Orgrimmar and Stormwind.
Automates harvesting of herbs from the garden.
Generates more Blackrock Ore reagents in your shipments.
Generates more True Iron Ore reagents in your shipments.
A delivery a fresh fish every day, direct to your Fishing Shack!
Greatly increases the chance that you will find bait while fishing in Garrison waters.
Grants you a chance to catch Frostdeep Minnow's in Garrison waters.  These can be used to summon a Frostdeep Cavedweller.
Your Alchemy Lab takes on students, and the class has a couple of potions for you each day.
The lab specializes in the mutable nature of physical objects, increasing the amount of Metamorphic Crystals that can be produced each day.
The lab specializes in catalyzing alchemical reactions, increasing the amount of Alchemical Catalysts that can be produced each day.
Strengthens the troops in your Call to Arms ability, generating more damage.
Summons a First Aid nurse NPC that grants healing potions and bandages each day.
Occasionally catches thieves who can pay fines or provide useful information to serve their sentence.
Garrison guards patrol your mine, keeping it clear of hostile Goren.
Reduces cost of purchasing buildings and changing specializations.
